name: ListUsageTrigger
description: Retrieve a list of usage-triggers belonging to the account used to make the request

AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the UsageTrigger resources to read.

Recurring.description: The frequency of recurring UsageTriggers to read. Can be: `daily`, `monthly`, or `yearly` to read recurring UsageTriggers. An empty value or a value of `alltime` reads non-recurring UsageTriggers.

TriggerBy.description: The trigger field of the UsageTriggers to read.  Can be: `count`, `usage`, or `price` as described in the [UsageRecords documentation](https://www.twilio.com/docs/usage/api/usage-record#usage-count-price).

UsageCategory.description: The usage category of the UsageTriggers to read. Must be a supported [usage categories](https://www.twilio.com/docs/usage/api/usage-record#usage-categories).

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
